name: Chhatish Kumar
college: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

full_output.summary: Skilled frontend developer with expertise in HTML, CSS, Tailwind, JavaScript, and ReactJS experienced in building web applications with a focus on user interface design, authentication, and data management using Firebase. Adept at solving algorithmic challenges and integrating data within React applications. Passionate about technology and sports, particularly cricket.

education.school: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology
education.field_of_study: Computer Science and Engineering (Internet of Things)

projects.name: Shipment Delivery Application
projects.description: Developed a real-time shipment tracking system with sign-in and sign-up functionality. Implemented Firebase Authentication to authenticate the application.

projects.name: Admin Dashboard
projects.description: Built during my internship at Celebal Technology. Added functionality such as charts, graphs, editors, calendars, Kanban, color pickers, and various other features for a comprehensive admin dashboard.

projects.name: Spotify Clone
projects.description: Developed a music player without using any frameworks or built-in functionality. buttons, playing gifs, cover themes, and titles. Implemented features like next/prev.

experiences.description: Built various ReactJS projects including a Shipment Delivery Application, To-do List, E-Commerce website, and Admin Dashboard. Used different tools such as Firebase for these projects.

full_output.name: Chhatish Kumar
